education.field_of_study: Computer Science and Engineering (Cloud Computing & Minor in Management)

projects.name: Realtime Collaborative Document Editing Webapp (noteit)
projects.description: Architected and deployed a robust SaaS platform, enabling seamless user sign-up, workspace creation, and real-time file editing, Github Link for varied subscription tiers, significantly enhancing user experience and engagement. Implemented real-time collaboration features, allowing concurrent editing and selection by multiple users within the same document, boosting team productivity by 40%.

projects.name: Serverless Email Marketing Application
projects.description: Deployed various AWS Services to build a system to send emails on a schedule, grabbing HTML email templates and a list of contacts from an S3 bucket, used to send 10k+ emails/hour.

projects.name: E-Commerce Store for Local Businesses (nukkad)
projects.description: Connecting the local shop-owners of neighbourhood, nukkad linked local businesses with customers. Buyers discover nearby stores, browse products, and connect, using 100+ profiles from open source datasets.

experiences.description: Spearheaded the development and launch of a mobile app version of Cashvisorys financial advisory platform, projected to cater to 17,000+ users in one year. Revamped the user onboarding experience using adaptive design principles and actionable insights, resolved major user challenges and expanding the user base by 8% in the first quarter.

Transformed the User Interface and Experience of the Hatchlab Research Centres Website spanning over 47+ pages, boosting User Engagement and higher click rates while also crafted compelling graphics, delivering about 70+ graphics each month.
